About the Phase 1 Project

Collision Detection for Machine Tool Automation using VLSI Design

Skills

  • VLSI design
  • FPGA Board
  • CNC Machine
  • SAT Algorithm

Project description

  • SAT Algorithm:Designed and implemented a real-time collision detection system using the Separating Axis Theorem algorithm,optimized for CNC machines to prevent tool and workpiece damage
  • Nexys 4 DDR:Developed the algorithm in Verilog HDL and deployed it on an FPGA for high-speed,parallel processing,achieving collision detection within 1ms
  • :Analyzed power,area and timing parameters to ensure efficient resource utilization and performance,with a focus on minimizing power consumption and maximizing throughput
